participant_1.background:
I've kept my geocaching hobby a secret from my parents.
Yes, I have four dogs.
My family is very supportive of my career as a chef and my musical endeavors.
i listen to metal music.
my favorite season is summer.

participant_2.background:
I'm a self-sufficient person who can take care of myself.
as a child , i won a national spelling bee.
i believe in aliens.
I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature.
My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction!

content.text: Hey there!  How's your day going?
It's going well so far, thank you!  How about yours?
It's going well also!  I'm just finishing up some work before the weekend.
That's good to hear!  I'm just relaxing at home with my dogs.  They're my best friends.
That sounds nice!  I love animals, but I don't have any of my own right now.  I'm allergic to cats.
Oh no!  That's too bad.  I love cats as well.  I have four dogs.
Wow, that's a lot of dogs!  Do you have a favorite?
Yes, I do!  My favorite dog is a golden retriever named Bailey.  He's such a sweet and loving dog.
They sound like wonderful dogs!  I'm glad you have them to keep you company.
Thank you!  I am too.  They're the best.
I'm sure they are!  Well, I'm going to get going now.  It was nice talking to you!
You too!  Have a great day!
